item.title: KTIR Stack = Kafka + Telegraf + InfluxDB + ReactJS Stack
item.author: Amit Singh
item.description: In the vast landscape of IoT (Internet of Things) applications, managing and processing sensor data efficiently is a critical aspect of extracting valuable insights. As the volume and complexity of data continue to grow, developers and engineers seek robust and scalable solutions to handle real-time data streams effectively. One such solution is the KTIR stack, combining Docker Compose, Kafka, Telegraf, InfluxDB, and ReactJS to create a powerful and comprehensive IoT stack.
